publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-931 Mr Jack McConnell: Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required by the Scottish Ministers to pay remuneration and allowances to part-time sheriffs.
S1M-931 Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution (lodged on 31 May 2000) Angus MacKay*, Mr Jim Wallace*

S1M-931 Mr Jack McConnell: Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required by the Scottish Ministers to pay remuneration and allowances to part-time sheriffs. Supported by: Angus MacKay, Mr Jim Wallace

S1M-931 Mr Jack McConnell: Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required by the Scottish Ministers to pay remuneration and allowances to part-time sheriffs. Supported by: Angus MacKay, Mr Jim Wallace

S1M-931 Mr Jack McConnell: Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of sums required by the Scottish Ministers to pay remuneration and allowances to part-time sheriffs. Supported by: Angus MacKay, Mr Jim Wallace
S1M-931 Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill – Financial Resolution – Motion Withdrawn
